title: DELHIWTSA24
description:
The ITU World Telecommunication Standardization 
Assembly (WTSA-24), scheduled to take place in New Delhi, India, from 15 to 24 
October 2024, is a significant global event that shapes the future of 
telecommunication standards. As part of this assembly, a dedicated mobile app will 
enhance participants' experience and facilitate engagement. ITU WTSA 2024 
Mobile App developed by Host Country (India) will facilitate the participant,  
delegates and organisers by providing relevant information related to: 
a)Logistics Information: 
-The app will provide essential details about the arrivals, local 
transport, accomodation, schedules, venues, and session topics. 
-Participants can access real-time updates, ensuring they stay 
informed throughout the event. 
b)Agenda and Sessions: 
-Users can view the complete agenda, including plenary sessions, 
working group meetings, and side events. 
-Session details, speakers, and topics will be readily available. 
c)Networking Opportunities: 
-The app will feature networking functionalities, allowing attendees to 
connect with fellow participants, industry experts, and policymakers. 
-Attendees can schedule meetings, exchange contact information, and 
engage in discussions. 
d)Interactive Maps: 
-Navigating the event venue will be seamless with interactive maps. 
-Users can find session rooms, exhibition areas, and other facilities 
effortlessly. 
e)Notifications and Reminders: 
-The app will send push notifications for important announcements, 
reminders, and last-minute changes. 
-Participants won't miss critical sessions or updates.

developer.devId: Department of Telecommunications, Govt of India
